description: Observability stack broadcasting Prometheus metrics and OpenTelemetry traces over TLS1.3 for auditability.
steps: Instrument scheduler, workers, and detectors with tracing spans and metrics
Expose metrics endpoints over HTTPS (HTTP/2 + TLS1.3) or via an authenticated proxy
Send OpenTelemetry traces to configured collectors using TLS1.3
Correlate findings with trace IDs for debugging
Validate observability endpoints reject unauthorized requests
acceptance_criteria: Prometheus scrapes deliver metrics via OAuth-protected endpoints
Traces include scan IDs for correlation
Observability endpoints only accept OS-trusted TLS certificates
